DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This chemotherapy combination contains the drugs capecitabine (Xeloda) and irinotecan hydrochloride. Combinations usually work better than single drugs because different drugs kill cancer cells in different ways.

Section.Para: Each of the drugs in this combination is approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to treat cancer or conditions related to cancer.

Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Colorectal cancer that has metastasized (spread to other parts of the body).
Esophageal cancer that is advanced or has metastasized.
Gastric (stomach) cancer that is advanced or has metastasized.

Section.Para: This combination may also be used with other drugs or treatments or to treat other types of cancer.
